punt_return_attempts.sentence: The Chiefs managed just 5 first downs (1 in the second half) and failed to convert any third downs (0-of-11).

1.comment: Antoine Cason made a great play to tip it away from Bowe.    San Diego completely dominated this game. The Chargers had 426 total yards, compared to Kansas City's 67 (16 in the second half). The Chiefs managed just 5 first downs (1 in the second half) and failed to convert any third downs (0-of-11).    Cason made a great play to tip it away from Bowe. 2.comment: Antoine Cason intercepted him to pretty much seal the victory. The Chargers' offense piled up more yards when Jackson had a 41 yard run on a screen pass, running out most of the remaining clock. San Diego lost the 3.way tiebreaker for the division, and despite scoring 34-plus points 4 times in the final 5 games, needed a lot of those points last week when they lost 38-10 at Detroit. The team dragged Oakland out of the playoffs with them, and possibly saved their head coach's job in the process.   Cason intercepted him to pretty much seal the victory. The Chargers' offense piled up more yards when Jackson had a 41 yard run on a screen pass, running out most of the remaining clock. San Diego lost the 3.way tiebreaker for the division, and despite scoring 34-plus points 4 times in the final 5 games, needed a lot of those points last week when they lost 38-10 at Detroit. The team dragged Oakland out of the playoffs with them, and possibly saved their head coach's job in the process.

3.comment: Antoine Cason, and Carolina recovered at the Bears' 23-yard line. Newton hit then Olsen for 2 big throws, including a short touchdown to take the lead.
